cleaned_text: Traditional Chinese Herbal Medicine consists of thousands of substances derived from plant, animal, and mineral sources. The use of these substances can be traced back to 1,000 BC. Herbal medicine is the primary modality within Traditional Chinese Medicine which is the world's oldest, continually practiced, professional medicine. Over the past 3000 years, an incredibly rich and powerful system has medicine has been created. During this time, classical herbal formulas that are effective for many health concerns have been developed. The herbs are available in the form of herbal teas, liquid extracts, tablets, capsules, granules, lotions, creams, salves, or poultices. Although acupuncture was the first Chinese modality to gain wide acceptance in U.S., Chinese herbal medicine is quickly establishing itself as one of the most popular and effective alternative therapies.. We have hundreds herbal products that meet most conditions we encounter. We have herbal pills, tablets, granules, powder, and herbal tea. We also have an herb cooking and packing machine. We can prescribe custom herbal formulas, cooking and packing for our clients. It is very convenient and effective for our clients to take the herbal tea for months. You may notice as you read about our various services that they interact and support each other in a holistic approach to physical and mental health and harmony.
